act_info.full_title: Keeping Students in Class Repeal Act, 2022, S.O. 2022, c. 20
act_info.act_name_text: Keeping Students in Class Repeal Act, 2022

content.content: 1 The Keeping Students in Class Act, 2022 is repealed and is deemed for all purposes never to have been in force.
content.raw_html: 1 The Keeping Students in Class Act, 2022 is repealed and is deemed for all purposes never to have been in force.

content.content:
2 For greater certainty, the collective agreements that were deemed to be in operation under subsection 5 (1) of the Keeping Students in Class Act, 2022 are deemed for all purposes never to have come into operation. 3 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
2 For greater certainty, the collective agreements that were deemed to be in operation under subsection 5 (1) of the Keeping Students in Class Act, 2022 are deemed for all purposes never to have come into operation.

3 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________

 

Français
